div.p:
THE MOON IS DOWN.
I HAVE NOT HEARD THE CLOCK.

A HEAVY SUMMONS LIES
LIKE LEAD UPON ME,
AND YET I WOULD NOT SLEEP.

MERCIFUL POWERS, RESTRAIN IN ME
THE CURSED THOUGHTS

THAT NATURE GIVES WAY TO
IN REPOSE.

WHAT, SIR,
NOT YET AT REST?

HE HATH BEEN
IN UNUSUAL PLEASURE,

AND SENT FORTH GREAT LARGESS
TO YOUR OFFICES.

THIS DIAMOND HE GREETS
YOUR WIFE WITHAL,

BY THE NAME
OF MOST KIND HOSTESS,

AND SHUT UP
IN MEASURELESS CONTENT.

OUR WILL BECAME
THE SERVANT TO DEFECT,

WHICH ELSE SHOULD FREE
HAVE WROUGHT.

I DREAMT LAST NIGHT
OF THE THREE WEIRD SISTERS.

TO YOU THEY HAVE SHOWED
SOME TRUTH.

YET WHEN WE CAN ENTREAT
AN HOUR TO SERVE,

IN SOME WORDS
UPON THAT BUSINESS,

IF YOU WOULD
GRANT THE TIME.

IF YOU SHALL CLEAVE
TO MY CONSENT,

WHEN 'TIS, IT SHALL
MAKE HONOR FOR YOU.

SO I LOSE NONE
IN SEEKING TO AUGMENT IT,

BUT STILL KEEP
MY BOSOM FRANCHISED

THANKS, SIR.
THE LIKE TO YOU.

GO BID THY MISTRESS,
WHEN MY DRINK IS READY,

IS THIS A DAGGER
WHICH I SEE BEFORE ME,

AND YET
I SEE THEE STILL.

ART THOU NOT, FATAL VISION,
SENSIBLE TO FEELING AS TO SIGHT?

OR ART THOU BUT A DAGGER
OF THE MIND,

A FALSE CREATION PROCEEDING
FROM THE HEAT-OPPRESSED BRAIN?

IN FORM AS PALPABLE
AS THIS WHICH NOW I DRAW.

THOU MARSHAL'ST ME THE WAY
THAT I WAS GOING,

AND SUCH AN INSTRUMENT
I WAS TO USE.

MINE EYES ARE MADE THE FOOLS
O' THE OTHER SENSES,

AND ON MY BLADE AND DUDGEON
GOUTS OF BLOOD,

IT IS THE BLOODY BUSINESS
WHICH INFORMS THUS TO MINE EYES.

NOW O'ER THE ONE HALF WORLD
NATURE SEEMS DEAD,

AND WICKED DREAMS ABUSE
THE CURTAINED SLEEP.

AND WITHERED MURDER, ALARUMED
BY HIS SENTINEL, THE WOLF,

THUS WITH THIS STEALTHY PACE,
WITH TARQUIN'S RAVISHING STRIDE,

TOWARD HIS DESIGN MOVES
LIKE A GHOST.

THOU SURE AND FIRM-SET EARTH,
HEAR NOT MY STEPS,

FOR FEAR THE VERY STONES PRATE
OF MY WHEREABOUT;

AND TAKE THE PRESENT HORROR
FROM THE TIME,
I GO, AND IT IS DONE.

FOR IT IS A KNELL
THAT SUMMONS THEE TO HEAVEN...

THAT WHICH HATH MADE THEM DRUNK
HATH MADE ME BOLD.

WHAT HATH QUENCHED THEM
HATH GIVEN ME FIRE.

IT WAS THE OWL THAT SHRIEKED,
THE FATAL BELLMAN,

WHICH GIVES
THE STERN'ST GOOD NIGHT.

THAT DEATH AND NATURE
DO CONTEND ABOUT THEM,

ALACK, I AM AFRAID THEY
HAVE AWAKED AND 'TIS NOT DONE.

THE ATTEMPT AND NOT THE DEED
CONFOUNDS US.

HAD HE NOT RESEMBLED MY FATHER
AS HE SLEPT, I HAD DONE 'T.

DIDST THOU NOT HEAR
A NOISE?

I HEARD THE OWL SCREAM
AND THE CRICKETS CRY.

WHO LIES
I' THE SECOND CHAMBER?

FOOLISH THOUGHT,
TO SAY A SORRY SIGHT.

THERE'S ONE DID LAUGH
IN 'S SLEEP,

THAT THEY DID WAKE EACH OTHER.
I STOOD AND HEARD THEM.

BUT THEN THEY DID SAY
THEIR PRAYERS
AND ADDRESS THEM AGAIN TO SLEEP.

ONE CRIED, "GOD BLESS US!"
AND, "AMEN," THE OTHER,

AS THEY HAD SEEN ME
WITH THESE HANGMAN'S HANDS.

LISTENING THEIR FEAR,
I COULD NOT SAY "AMEN"

WHEN THEY DID SAY
"GOD BLESS US!"

BUT WHEREFORE
COULD I NOT PRONOUNCE "AMEN"?
I HAD MOST NEED OF BLESSING.

THESE DEEDS MUST NOT
BE THOUGHT AFTER THESE WAYS.
SO IT WILL MAKE US MAD.

METHOUGHT I HEARD A VOICE CRY,
"SLEEP NO MORE!

SLEEP THAT KNITS UP
THE RAVELED SLEEVE OF CARE,

THE DEATH OF EACH DAY'S LIFE,
SORE LABOR'S BATH,

BALM OF HURT MINDS,
GREAT NATURE'S SECOND COURSE,

WHO WAS IT
THAT THUS CRIED?

YOU DO UNBEND
YOUR NOBLE STRENGTH

TO THINK SO BRAINSICKLY
OF THINGS?

AND WASH THIS FILTHY WITNESS
FROM YOUR HANDS.

WHY DID YOU BRING
THESE DAGGERS

AND SMEAR THE SLEEPY GROOMS
WITH BLOOD.

I AM AFRAID TO THINK
WHAT I HAVE DONE.

LOOK ON 'T AGAIN
I DARE NOT.

THE SLEEPING AND THE DEAD
ARE BUT AS PICTURES.

'TIS THE EYE OF CHILDHOOD
THAT FEARS A PAINTED DEVIL.

I'LL GUILD THE FACES
OF THE GROOMS WITHAL,

FOR IT MUST SEEM
THEIR GUILT.

HOW IS IT WITH ME
WHEN EVERY NOISE APPALS ME?
HA. THEY PLUCK OUT MINE EYES.

WASH THIS BLOOD CLEAN
FROM MY HAND?

THIS MY HAND WILL RATHER THE
MULTITUDINOUS SEAS INCARNADINE,

MY HANDS ARE
OF YOUR COLOR,

BUT I SHAME TO WEAR
A HEART SO WHITE!

I HEAR A KNOCKING
AT THE SOUTH ENTRY.

A LITTLE WATER CLEARS US
OF THIS DEED.

YOUR CONSTANCY
HATH LEFT YOU UNATTENDED.

LEST OCCASION CALL
AND SHOW US TO BE WATCHERS.

BE NOT LOST SO POORLY
IN YOUR THOUGHTS.

IF A MAN WERE PORTER
OF HELL GATE,

HE SHOULD HAVE
OLD TURNIN' THE KEY.

WHO'S THERE,
I' THE NAME OF BEELZEBUB?

HERE'S A FARMER
THAT HANGED HIMSELF

HAVE NAPKINS ENOW ABOUT YOU;
HERE YOU'LL SWEAT FOR IT.

WHO'S THERE,
IN TH' OTHER DEVIL'S NAME?

THAT COULD SWEAR IN BOTH THE
SCALES AGAINST EITHER SCALE,

WHO COMMITTED TREASON ENOUGH
FOR GOD'S SAKE,

YET COULD NOT EQUIVOCATE
TO HEAVEN.

FAITH, HERE'S
AN ENGLISH TAILOR
COME HITHER,

FOR STEALING OUT
OF A FRENCH HOSE!

HERE YOU MAY ROAST
YOUR GOOSE.

THIS PLACE
IS TOO COLD FOR HELL.

I HAD THOUGHT TO HAVE LET IN
SOME OF ALL PROFESSIONS

THAT GO THE PRIMROSE WAY
TO EVERLASTING BONFIRE.

I PRAY YOU
REMEMBER THE PORTER!

ERE YOU WENT TO BED,
THAT YOU DO LIE SO LATE?

FAITH, SIR, WE WERE CAROUSING
TILL THE SECOND COCK!

AND DRINK, SIR, IS A GREAT
PROVOKER OF THREE THINGS!

WHAT THREE THINGS
DOES DRINK ESPECIALLY PROVOKE?

MARRY, SIR, NOSE-PAINTING,
SLEEP, AND URINE.

LECHERY, SIR, IT PROVOKES
AND UNPROVOKES.

BUT IT TAKES AWAY
THE PERFORMANCE, SIR.

THEREFORE MUCH DRINK
MAY BE SAID

TO BE AN EQUIVOCATOR
WITH LECHERY.

IT MAKES HIM
AND IT MARS HIM,

IT SETS HIM ON
AND IT TAKES HIM OFF,

IT PERSUADES HIM
AND DISHEARTENS HIM,

MAKES HIM STAND TO
AND NOT STAND TO;

AND GIVIN' HIM THE LIE,
LEAVES HIM.

I BELIEVE DRINK
GAVE THEE THE LIE.

THAT IT DID, SIR,
I' THE VERY THROAT ON ME.

BUT I REQUITED HIM
FOR HIS LIE,

AND, I THINK, BEING
TOO STRONG FOR HIM,

THOUGH HE TOOK UP
MY LEGS SOMETIME,

YET I MADE A SHIFT
TO CAST HIM.

IS THE KING STIRRING,
WORTHY THANE?

HE DID COMMAND ME
TO CALL TIMELY ON HIM.

I HAVE ALMOST SLIPPED
THE HOUR.

I KNOW THIS IS
A JOYFUL TROUBLE TO YOU,

THE LABOR WE DELIGHT IN
PHYSICS PAIN.

I'LL MAKE SO BOLD TO CALL,
FOR 'TIS MY LIMITED SERVICE.

HE DOES.
HE DID APPOINT SO.

WHERE WE LAY,
OUR CHIMNEYS WERE BLOWN DOWN,

p.span:
AND, AS THEY SAY,
LAMENTINGS HEARD I' THE AIR,

div.p:
OF DIRE COMBUSTION
AND CONFUSED EVENTS

THE OBSCURE BIRD CLAMORED
THE LIVELONG NIGHT.

SOME SAY THE EARTH
WAS FEVEROUS AND DID SHAKE.

MY YOUNG REMEMBRANCE
CANNOT PARALLEL A FELLOW TO IT.

TONGUE NOR HEART CANNOT CONCEIVE
NOR NAME THEE!

CONFUSION NOW HATH MADE
HIS MASTERPIECE!

HATH BROKE OPE
THE LORD'S ANOINTED TEMPLE,

AND STOLE THENCE THE LIFE
O' THE BUILDING!

AND DESTROY YOUR SIGHTS
WITH A NEW GORGON.

AWAKE, AWAKE!
RING THE ALARUM BELL!

SHAKE OFF THIS DOWNY SLEEP,
DEATH'S COUNTERFEIT,

UP, UP AND SEE
THE GREAT DOOM'S IMAGE!

AS FROM YOUR GRAVES
RISE UP AND WALK LIKE SPRITES,

THAT SUCH A TRUMPET CALLS
TO PARLEY THE SLEEPERS?

'TIS NOT FOR YOU TO HEAR
WHAT I CAN SPEAK.

THE REPETITION,
IN A WOMAN'S EAR,

DEAR DUFF, I PRITHEE,
CONTRADICT THYSELF,

HAD I BUT DIED AN HOUR
BEFORE THIS CHANCE,

I HAD LIVED
A BLESSED TIME,

THE WINE OF LIFE
IS DRAWN,

AND THE MERE LEES
IS LEFT TO BRAG OF.

YOU ARE,
AND DO NOT KNOW 'T.

THE FOUNTAIN
OF YOUR BLOOD IS STOPPED.

THOSE OF HIS CHAMBER
HAD DONE 'T.

THEIR HANDS AND FACES
WERE ALL BADGED WITH BLOOD.

WHICH UNWIPED WE FOUND
UPON THEIR PILLOWS.

NO MAN'S LIFE
WAS TO BE TRUSTED WITH THEM.

I DO REPENT ME OF MY FURY,
THAT I DID KILL THEM.

LOYAL AND NEUTRAL,
IN A MOMENT?

p.span:
THE EXPEDITION
OF MY VIOLENT LOVE

div.p:
HIS SILVER SKIN LACED
WITH HIS GOLDEN BLOOD,

p.span:
LIKE A BREACH IN NATURE
FOR RUIN'S WASTEFUL ENTRY.

div.p:
STEEPED IN THE COLORS
OF THEIR TRADE,

WHO COULD REFRAIN
THAT HAD A HEART TO LOVE,

AND IN THAT HEART COURAGE
TO MAKE HIS LOVE KNOWN?
WHY DO WE HOLD OUR TONGUES

THAT MOST MAY CLAIM
THIS ARGUMENT FOR OURS?

WHAT SHOULD BE SPOKEN HERE,
WHERE OUR FATE,

HID IN AN AUGER HOLE,
MAY RUSH AND SEIZE US?

OUR TEARS
ARE NOT YET BREWED.

NOR OUR STRONG SORROW
UPON THE FOOT OF MOTION.

AND WHEN WE HAVE
OUR NAKED FRAILTIES HID,

THIS MOST BLOODY PIECE
OF WORK,

IN THE GREAT HAND
OF GOD I STAND

p.span:
AND THENCE, AGAINST
THE UNDIVULGED PRETENCE,

div.p:
LET'S BRIEFLY
PUT ON MANLY READINESS,

AND MEET I'
THE HALL TOGETHER.

TO SHOW AN UNFELT SORROW
IS AN OFFICE

WHICH THE FALSE MAN
DOES EASY.

OUR SEPARATED FORTUNES
SHALL KEEP US BOTH THE SAFER.

WHERE WE ARE THERE'S DAGGERS
IN MEN'S SMILES.

THE NEAR IN BLOOD,
THE NEARER BLOODY.

THIS MURDEROUS SHAFT
HATH NOT YET LIGHTED,

AND THE SAFEST WAY
IS TO AVOID THE AIM.

AND LET US NOT BE DAINTY
OF LEAVE-TAKING,

THERE'S WARRANT IN THAT THEFT
WHICH STEALS ITSELF

THREESCORE AND TEN
I CAN REMEMBER WELL,
WITHIN THE VOLUME OF WHICH TIME

I HAVE SEEN HOURS DREADFUL
AND THINGS STRANGE,

BUT THIS SORE NIGHT
HATH TRIFLED FORMER KNOWINGS.

AS TROUBLED WITH MAN'S ACT,
THREATENS HIS BLOODY STAGE.

AND YET DARK NIGHT STRANGLES
THE TRAVELING LAMP.

IS 'T NIGHT'S PREDOMINANCE,
OR THE DAY'S SHAME,

THAT DARKNESS DOES
THE FACE OF EARTH ENTOMB

WHEN LIVING LIGHT
SHOULD KISS IT?

'TIS UNNATURAL,
EVEN LIKE THE DEED THAT'S DONE.

ON TUESDAY LAST A FALCON
TOWERING IN HER PRIDE OF PLACE

WAS BY A MOUSING OWL
HAWKED AT AND KILLED.

A THING MOST STRANGE
AND CERTAIN--

BEAUTEOUS AND SWIFT,
THE MINIONS OF THEIR RACE,

TURNED WILD IN NATURE,
BROKE THEIR STALLS, FLUNG OUT,

AS THEY WOULD MAKE WAR
WITH MANKIND.

TO THE AMAZEMENT
OF MINE EYES,

HOW GOES THE WORLD,
SIR, NOW?

IS 'T KNOWN WHO DID
THIS MORE THAN BLOODY DEED?

MALCOLM AND DONALBAIN,
THE KING'S TWO SONS,

WHICH PUTS UPON THEM
SUSPICION OF THE DEED.

THAT WILT RAVIN UP
THINE OWN LIFE'S MEANS.

AND GONE TO SCONE
TO BE INVESTED.

THE SACRED STOREHOUSE
OF HIS PREDECESSORS

WELL MAY YOU SEE THINGS
WELL DONE THERE.

LEST OUR OLD ROBES
SIT EASIER THAN OUR NEW.

AND WITH THOSE THAT WOULD MAKE
GOOD OF BAD AND FRIENDS OF FOES.
